ref.mixed-citation: Gautret P, Lagier J C, Parola P, Thuan H V, Meddeb L, Sevestre J, Mailhe M, Doudier B, Aubry C, Amrane S, Seng P, Hocquart M, Finance J, Vieira V E, Dupont H T, Honor S, Stein A, Million M, Colson P, Scola B L, Veit V, Jacquier A, Drancourt J C D M, Fournier P E, Rolain J M, Brouqui P, Raoult D.
